statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_level > 3 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_frequency FROM pricing_strategy WHERE purchase_frequency < 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT customer_name, demand_level, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_level = 2 AND purchase_amount < 1000 ORDER BY demand_level DESC, purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, demand_level, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE demand_level > 3 AND purchase_frequency > 5 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, demand_level, purchase_amount FROM pricing_strategy WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY demand_level DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount, MAX(demand_level) AS max_demand_level FROM pricing_strategy WHERE purchase_frequency >= 10 AND demand_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_rating FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_rating > 3;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_rating FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM transportation_demand WHERE demand_amount < 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_rating > 3
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_rating = 5
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_rating FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_rating DESC
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT * FROM transportation_demand WHERE transportation_type='Car'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT forecast_date, demand_estimate FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_estimate > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT forecast_date, SUM(demand_estimate) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY forecast_date ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behaviour;
SELECT * FROM transportation_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_details FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, demand_id, strategy_id, analysis_result FROM pricing_analysis WHERE analysis_result < 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123 AND demand_id = 456 AND strategy_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM customer_behaviour WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviour ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(analysis_result) AS total_analysis_result FROM pricing_analysis GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, demand_date, demand_quantity FROM customer_behaviour JOIN transportation_demand ON customer_id = demand_id;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_details FROM pricing_strategy WHERE LENGTH(strategy_details) > 500 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT transport_mode, distance, cost_per_km FROM Transportation WHERE cost_per_km < 5 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer c JOIN Order o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Transportation WHERE distance > 100 AND cost_per_km < 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
